text:
,	14-16	October	2002.	Members	of	the	Center	for	evaluation	of	
effectiveness	of	health	care-CeVEAS	(Simona	di	Mario,	Vittorio	Basevi,	Gianfranco	Gori,	
Daniela	Spettoli,	Dante	Baronciani	and	Nicola	Magrini)	developed	the	table	of	evidence	and	
provided	additional	insightful	review	of	the	evidence	section.	We	thank	Jos	Vandelaer	and	
Matthews	Mathai	for	helpful	comments	on	the	final	draft,	Frank	Teckston	for	the	editing	and	
Duke	Gyamerah	for	the	layout.
WHO	acknowledges	the	generous	contribution
